page.title: 07Government (Parish)
page.content:
The Parish Council is responsible for the everyday running of the village. The Council members are elected by the resident adults (over 18 yrs) who are listed in the Electoral Register which is displayed in the Village Post Office. The Council sits at regular intervals to consider, discuss and resolve any problems related to the planning of building developments, street lighting and cleaning etc.
The Parish and District Councils also have representatives as members of the Governing Body of the local Primary School.
